job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Applied ML
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtApple Special Projects Group is seeking software engineers to develop scalable machine learning approaches for autonomous systems You will directly contribute to ML approaches using rich data You will work closely with specialists across highperformance computing machine learning and autonomous system development to identify needs and deliver new capabilities You will share every stage of development from concept to deployment ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtJOB SUMMARY ltbrgtltbrgt  Build and integrate end to end lifecycles of largescale distributed machine learning systems using the latest open source technologiesltbrgtltbrgt  Build software that improves your rate of experimentation and helps you make better decisions about what to try nextltbrgtltbrgt  Train evaluate and debug deep learning models for complex tasksltbrgtltbrgt  Develop tools and services for improving ML systems beyond modeling choices  data distribution editing data quality improvements and representation learning with selfsupervisionltbrgtltbrgt  Improve distributed cloud GPU training approaches for deep learning modelsltbrgtltbrgt  Collaborate with engineers across functions to solve complex data problems at scaleltbrgtltbrgt  Identify and evaluate new patterns and technologies to improve performance maintainability and elegance of our machine learning systemsltbrgtltbrgt  Lead technical projects to completion Communicate with peers to build requirements and track progressltbrgtltbrgt  Mentor fellow engineers in your areas of expertiseltbrgtltbrgt  Contribute to a team culture that values effective collaboration technical perfection and innovationltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtSignificant fulltime experience building end to end data systems as an ML Engineer Platform Engineer or equivalentltbrgtltbrgtSolid software engineering skills in complex multilanguage systems Fluency in PythonltbrgtltbrgtExperience working with cloud data processing technologies Spark Dask ElasticSearch Presto SQL etcltbrgtltbrgtExpertise in ML algorithms and top practices for working with deep learning systemsltbrgtltbrgtProficiency with ML modeling frameworks PyTorch Tensorflow etcltbrgtltbrgtAbility to serve as a technical lead  building technical requirements software design implementation and clear communicationltbrgtltbrgtStrong overall software development approach You deliver clean welltested codeltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtWe are a team of hardworking engineers and researchers with deep experience in robotics machine learning and software engineering We work on exciting new technologies and balance exploration of new problems with resultdriven project planning and execution In our daily work the team stays effective productive and fun by sharing some key valuesltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtPassion for the mission Were here to make something extraordinary We seek whatever work is right and strive for the best possible resultsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtModesty The right answer is more significant than being right We search for solutions as a team and value cleareyed feedbackltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtLean habits You cant grow without limits Time constraints and big goals encourage us to sharpen our focus and learn to make phenomenal decisionsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelors Masters or PhD Degree in Computer ScienceMachine Learning or equivalent professional
